solution.text:
According to the scale, 1cm = 300km of actual distance.
Thus, _{j}_ cm = _{j}_ x 300 km of actual distance = _{{j*300}}_ km.

content.text: The distance between Pune and Delhi is shown as _{j}_ cm on a map. If the scale on the map is given as 1 cm = 300 km, what is the actual distance in km between Pune and Delhi according to the map?
